titleStmt.title: A. J. Alexander to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG14243

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 3

body.p:
Hd Qrs 1st Ky Cav
Allatoona Geo
June 7" 1864.
Gov Bramlette
Sir

I have the honor to recommend to you for promotion 2nd Lt Wm H Norton ^Co "C" 11" Ky Cav^ to be commissioned 1st Lt of same Company ^Vice Lt Debaum resigned^ also Orderly Sergeant J. J. Rose of Co "C" 11" Ky Cav to be 2nd Lt same company vice Norton promoted.

I am Sir very
Resptly
Your obt Servt
A. J Alexander
Lt Col. Cmdg 11th Ky Cav.
this Com could not be issued Norton leaving resgined as 1 Lieut

2nd Lieut. Wm H. Norton com 1 Lieut Coy C. 11 Ky Cavy vice Saml P. Debaum resigned June 268. 1864
Sergt. J. J. Rose com 2 Lieut Coy H. ^C^ 11 Ky Cavy vice. Wm H Norton promo ^resig:^ June 28. 1864
1.2.3.4.5.6

11 Cavy
Alltoona Ga
June 7th 1864
Alexander A. J
Lt Col Comd
Recommends for promotion 2 Lt Wm H Norton Co 'C" to be 1st Lt same Co vice Debaum resigned. Sergt J. J Rose Co C" to be 2nd Lt vice Norton pro.
Issue.
Boyle
Norton resig April 25. 1864

Com issd & forwd
June 28. 1864
Recd A G O. 27 June 1864
